entry.title: Hematochezia (Blood in Stool) in Cats
entry.summary: Hematochezia is the presence of bright red, fresh blood in the feces in cats. Hematochezia usually occurs with bleeding in the lower intestines (colon, rectum). Hematochezia should not be confused with melena, which is the passage of dark, tarry, black feces. Learn more about hematochezia in cats here.

entry.title: Vaginal Discharge in Cats
entry.summary: Vaginal discharge is the appearance of liquid material (other than urine) from the labia of the vulva (the external female genitals) of cats.
